title: NZ Cheesey Scones
ingredients:
2 cups plain flour

1 teaspoon sugar
Pinch cayenne
1 cup milk
2 teaspoons baking powder
½ teaspoon salt
2 cups grated tasty cheese
method: Preheat oven to 220ºC and place a baking tray in the oven.
Sift flour, sugar, cayenne, baking powder, salt into a bowl.
Make a well in the centre and add the milk.
Mix quickly with a knife and turn out onto a floured board.
Quickly shape into a 3cm thick (approx.) rectangle and cut into eight squares.
Bake on a floured hot tray for 15-20mins.
